main: ^Ah, hello there! Lovely day, isn’t it?
^How can I get across the road?

c-0: ^Heh! At my age, every good day’s a victory.
c-1: ^Across the road? Hmm... gates’re locked tight these days.

c-0: ^Might need to find yourself a key first. Could’ve sworn I saw one lyin’ around the park somewhere...

c-2: ^Off so soon? Well, enjoy the sunshine!
